titles.title: A resolution recognizing May 16, 2012, as Hereditary Angioedema Awareness Day and expressing the sense of the Senate that more research and treatments are needed for Hereditary Angioedema.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/31/2012--Passed Senate amended. Recognizes May 16, 2012, as Hereditary Angioedema Awareness Day. Expresses support for increased awareness of Hereditary Angioedema by physicians and the public.
